entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Temiscouata
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
